results.definition: a publication (or a passage from a publication) that is referred to
examples: he spent hours looking for the source of that quotation

results.definition: someone who originates or causes or initiates something
anything (a person or animal or plant or substance) in which an infectious agent normally lives and multiplies
the place where something begins, where it springs into being
examples: Pittsburgh is the source of the Ohio River

results.definition: anything that provides inspiration for later work
a document (or organization) from which information is obtained
examples: the reporter had two sources for the story

results.definition: a facility where something is available
get (a product) from another country or business
examples: She sourced a supply of carpet
The writer carefully sourced her report

results.definition: (technology) a process by which energy or a substance enters a system
